channel.title: krimms on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in krimms on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Received Rollerdog from Krimms
item.description: 16:57 Thursday 28 May 2015 JST I received via snail mail the hardcopy version of Rollerdog I purchased from Krimms. It looks beautiful in its pristine packaging. I haven’t opened it yet, and probably won’t open it until further notice… though I’ll email him and ask if there’s anything he put in the book specifically for me.

item.title: Simon finished Rollerdog!
item.description: 14:12 Saturday 23 May 2015 JST Rollerdog is a book designed for little people growing up in the brave new world (order) of the 21st century. Rather than instilling fear in young minds, the storyline about Humphry the Rollerdog creates an image of hope. However, the pictures which are crafted for deeper interpretation by adult readers, compose a message of warning…
